headline: Emails Confirm Hunter Biden Invested in Chinese Government-Owned Companies
author: Scott Hounsell
sentences: The now-president’s son has had a long history of using his father’s influence to enrich himself, including real estate transactions, oil and gas consultant contracts, and even the effort to sell an American company that made technology for the US Joint Strike Fighter Program, to a Chinese defense company.

A new report from Fox Business, sourcing emails obtained by the media company, shows that Hunter Biden’s investments into Chinese companies lasted well into 2017, a fact that the Biden Administration has yet to acknowledge or admit.

This latest report confirms that in March of 2017, Hunter Biden’s business partner detailed to him in an email,
Comments:
Poor Hunter, he's just a misunderstood artist, struggling to make ends meet.
